reviews.review: mmmmhhh murder and out smarting murders
There's definitely a learning curve like any PVP game with rotating maps, but once you start to recognize where to go a bit better this game is a lot of fun.

The only reason i'm giving this game thumbs up is because with it, i found a very dear friend, if not, theres a lot of better and beautiful things to do with your life. 
This is not one of those.

the game has gone pretty stale, specially if you play killer, always the same 4 perks, always the same infuriating tacticts and always the same trolling survivors.
RIP DbD
this game is the equivalent of snorting broken shards of glass, but i can't stop playing
I love this game and would recommend except it is very toxic and the character can be ugly as fuck
Played Killers to indulge in being a sadistic ass hole. Got bullied by 4 people instead. 10/10 would recommend.

Nach 700 Stunden Lebenszeit die ich in diesem game verbracht habe ist es mal Zeit n Rezension zu schreiben.

Pros: Vom Grundprinzip her n gutes game. Für nen Asymmetrischen Multiplayer haben sie das balanceing zum Großteil ganz gut hinbekommen. Surviver mit Freunden bockt eif so mies, vorallem wenns mal gut läuft. (kommt mit meiner swf nich oft vor...) Killer kann auch mal ganz lustig sein. Ich warte immernoch auf 2-Spieler Killerrunden. 
Von den Perks her find ich die große Auswahl schon cool. man spielt zwar zum großteil eh nur meta perks weil alles andere 0 zum escapen oder 4k beiträgt, aber man kann so viel funny perkbuilds zusammenwürfeln dass eif nice momente entstehen. (oder man weint weil man nix geschissn bekommt)
Die Maps sind zum großteil schön gestaltet. Ding ist, nicht jeder Killer auf jeder map so stark wie andere Killer. Ist aber denke ich Logisch. 
Das war momentan alles was mir zum positiven einfällt

Cons: Jeder Killer mit high-ping hat einen Vorteil. Hat bhvr schon paar mal versucht zu fixen aber klappt nich so ganz. (mit gutem ping haste zum teil Nachteile weil deine grabs oft einfach abgebrochen werden)
Das geht einem ziemlich auf den Sack wenn man draufgeht obwohl man gut gespielt hat und z.B. das Fenster schon 5 Sekunden bevor der hit kam gevaultet is. Aber passiert.
Dann ein ganz großes Con: Die toxic community. Das is schon fast so schlimm wie in LoL. Man bekommt als Killer regelrecht depressive Momente weil surviver auf einem rumhacken oder im endgamechat eif ohne guten Grund beleidigen. An alle die so sind: chillt ma eure kleinen nuts bidde. das voll nervig. 
Zu guter letzt die bugs. Sind meistens nur kleine, unaufällige Fehler, aber im großen und ganzen können sie einem halt mal das ganze match, und somit den Spaß versauen. 

Fazit: super game mit toxic community. Aber die kann man ja ignorieren. Euer Ding ob ihr euch das antun wollt. Ich habs auch getan und ich bin noch am leben. So falsch kanns also nich sein.

I played 30 hours in 4 days. If you don't have a friend and you are an unsocial person. Don't stop! You can take this game.
Because It can be your friend and a piece of your life.
Just do yourself a favor and don't play this. Toxic af community with dull gameplay.

Have a lot of fun with this game, if on sale, definetely buy it!

One of the best horror games i ever played
Ich hab das Spiel jetzt 4 Stunden gezockt und bin hell auf begeistert. Werde auch gleich noch weiter spielen.

VERY SURVIVOR-BIASED.

It was fun to play this game as a killer only for the first few hours/matches.

You have to have had years of experience playing as killer to get consistent wins.

Let me outline why I now FVCKNG HATE this game:

1. ) The killer competes with 4 survivors who each have their own set of 4 perks (maximum) and an item of their choice (with up to two add-ons).

2. ) Repairing generators is fairly fast even without perks and/or items that help with repairing progress. 
- It is frustrating how 2-3 gens can be repaired while chasing a survivor for just a few minutes.

3. ) Survivors can body-block you to prevent their teammate from being hanged. After doing such an exhausting chase, there is still pressure of losing an incapped survivor because of some other perks like Decisive Strike, Flashbangs, Flashlight blinds, etc.

4. ) There are 2 exit gates far apart from each other, making killers less likely patrol gates for any escaping survivors. Given you found them, you still are unlikely to incap them since it requires two (2) hits to do so, unless you have perks that allow you to put them down with just one hit.

Yes I am displeased with the game's bias towards survivors.

I have played less than 1k hours and already feel like I wasted my money purchasing this game and some DLC's.

There are times when I do get to wipe out all survivors but I think it's either they are new players or they weren't taking the game seriously.

I have reached Master Killer status, and was even just one (1) point away from getting the Iridescent Achievement, but thanks to the MEDIOCRE mechanics of this game, all my time and effort given went to waste.

TO WHOEVER IS IN CHARGE WITH THE GAMES' MECHANICS:

 - Why give so much advantage to survivors if killers can be also played by people who can get upset? Wouldn't it be fair just to use bots in that case?

- Don't you have plans on amending the gameplay mechanics? I mean why the fuck has there to be two gates far from each other when majority of the killers walk like turtles?!

I have achieved the "Merciless Killer" status countless times, but displeased with the overall mechanics of the game.

I'm giving this one more month. If I don't see any improvement for the killers' side, I am quitting Steam for good.
I haven't played this game for a day yet and i can already tell its gonna make me need a second therapist.
Лучший выбор игры в вашей никчёмной жизни🤭

Fun game if you want to kill or be killed for being killer is annoying cause pallet looping tryhards but you got to have fun instead of raging and try your best to get them also Gen Rush which is just plainly stupid of the survivors cause they don't have a life if they do both but don't camp or tunnel cause that is just retarded for killers todo. Survivors are tricky to play if going against a good killer or your just a nobody with no life and tryhard this game but still scary or just annoying depending on how the killer is playing, plus skill checks are difficult unless you know how todo them easily but gens are also tricky but no to much detail just my idea.
P.S whoever says this review is bad your just a tryhard with no life that sits in his mothers basement hoping for a girlfriend but i can't burn trash if it's already burned to the ground.

我現在還在玩是因為朋友也在玩，如果沒有朋友的話建議不要買。殺手的話勉強還算能玩但是單獨一人玩倖存者的話就算了吧
現在的遊戲風氣非常差，我跟朋友組隊只要少於4人就一定出現只會修機的智障玩家即便我被鬼追被掛上鉤子，除了我朋友外根本不會有人救。就算救了也是蹭分而已照樣被鬼追著跑然後路人就放我去死爽爽修機，這時鬼就跟眼瞎一樣不會抓修機的人眼裡他媽只有我。連現在新倖存者的技能也是他媽鼓勵大家當水蛭吸在發電機上然後賣別人去死，搞成這樣我乾脆跟鬼組隊好了直接把其他人都賣了。完全感覺不到團隊精神，對單排的人來說場上根本是1個鬼帶3個手下這真的是非對稱競技遊戲：不是鬼對4個人，是1個人對4個鬼。
已经对卡米娜姐姐冲了一百次
Совет для новичков: Если вы не обмажетесь маслом и не отрастите волосы, то с шансом 99.9% вы сольетесь как бот, а так советую :3

Обычные догонялки. Можете купить, если вдруг вы поиграли во все игры в стиме и вам прям совсем нечего делать. Баланса нет (и не будет), матчмейкинга нет и не будет, комьюнити токсичнее дотерского ( в случае, если по какой то немыслимой причине вы играете не так, как само комьюнити этого хочет, даже если вы играете один).

Я вроде как уже писал, но весь геймплей - это догонялки. В прямом смысле этого слова. Правда за выживших вы даже сможете ремонтировать генераторы в перерыве от интереснейшего геймплея, что по сути является мини-игрой, где раз в минуту вам надо будет вовремя нажать пробел.
А большего эта игра предложить не может (ах да, скины).

Немного дополню:
Выжившие играют в 4м, но чата в игре нет. Хорошо, что существует дискорд, а потому если вы решили поиграть за выжившего в соло - вы не самый умный человек, извините.
